title: ** SOLD ** T206 Cobb, Bat Off, Raw, Poor

posts.post_title: ** SOLD ** T206 Cobb, Bat Off, Raw, Poor
posts.post_content:
I am going to upgrade this one down the road, so I am looking to sell this one. 
T206 Cobb, Bat Off, Polar Bear back.

Card is raw and in poor condition, paper loss, stain etc.

Paper loss is quite bad, but does not affect the face.

**SOLD ** USD, I take PP, Goods please add 3%

Price includes delivery and tracking.

Please PM if interested.

Thanks
